concept.title: Defining the RPC ID
concept.shortdesc: The RPC ID is a user-defined identifier that allows an SDC RPC origin and SDC RPC destination to recognize each other.

conbody.p: SDC RPC pipelinesRPC IDRPC IDin SDC RPC origins and destinationsTo enable the SDC RPC destination to write directly to an SDC RPC origin, use the same RPC ID in both stages.
To write to multiple pipelines, use the RPC ID in the SDC RPC destination and all related SDC RPC origins.
